origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'FileOperation.read_file', 'description': 'read file from disk', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'file_path', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The path of the file.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'text', 'description': 'the text of the file.'}]}, {'name': 'FileOperation.save_file', 'description': 'When all steps done, YOU MUST use save_file() to save the report', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'file_path', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The path where the file will be saved.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'status', 'description': 'the result of the execution'}]}, {'name': 'FinancialAnalysis.analyze_financial_data', 'description': 'Analyze financial data from a company', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'financial_data', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The financial data to be analyzed.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysis_result', 'description': 'the result of the financial analysis'}]}, {'name': 'FinancialAnalysis.generate_report', 'description': 'Generate a credit risk assessment report based on the analysis', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'analysis_result', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The result of the financial analysis.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'report', 'description': 'the generated report'}]}]

作为一名信用风险分析师，我需要评估一家借款企业的信用风险。请从文件 'data_v2/financial_data/company_financials.txt' 中读取该企业过去三年的财务报表数据，并分析其资产负债率、流动比率和净利润率。然后，从文件 'data_v2/financial_data/company_cash_flow.txt' 中读取该企业最近一年的现金流量表数据，评估其现金流的稳定性。最后，基于这些数据，生成一份信用风险评估报告并保存在 'outputs/credit_risk_report.txt'。此外，我希望在报告中包含一个标题为 '信用风险评估' 的概述，其中包括从分析中提取的前三个关键点。当前这一步的目标是什么?
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'file_path'的值是什么?

{'text': 'The company has shown a steady increase in assets over the past three years. The debt-to-asset ratio has decreased from 60% to 50%. The current ratio has improved from 1.5 to 2.0. The net profit margin has increased from 8% to 10%.'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'text': 'The company has shown a steady increase in assets over the past three years. The debt-to-asset ratio has decreased from 60% to 50%. The current ratio has improved from 1.5 to 2.0. The net profit margin has increased from 8% to 10%.'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'financial_data'的值是什么?

The company has shown a steady increase in assets over the past three years. The debt-to-asset ratio has decreased from 60% to 50%. The current ratio has improved from 1.5 to 2.0. The net profit margin has increased from 8% to 10%.

{'analysis_result': 'The company has shown a positive trend in financial health. The debt-to-asset ratio has decreased, indicating reduced financial risk. The current ratio has improved, suggesting better liquidity. The net profit margin has increased, reflecting higher profitability.'}

接下来要调用的工具的参数为：{'analysis_result': 'The company has shown a positive trend in financial health. The debt-to-asset ratio has decreased, indicating reduced financial risk. The current ratio has improved, suggesting better liquidity. The net profit margin has increased, reflecting higher profitability.'}
请回答以下问题：当前这一步的目标是什么?
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
